Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.decorators

Class BuildBeforeMove

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PowerDecorator
it.polimi.ingsw.model.decorators.BuildBeforeMove
All Implemented Interfaces:
Power
public class BuildBeforeMove
extends PowerDecorator
This class implements the power to build both before and after moving if the worker does not move up.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • checkMove

      public java.util.ArrayList<Error> checkMove​(Worker w, int x, int y)
      This method overrides checkMove (Power Decorator) decorating decoratedPower with BuildBeforeMove rules.
      Specified by:
      checkMove in interface Power
      Overrides:
      checkMove in class PowerDecorator
      Parameters:
      w - is the worker that wants to move
      x - is the x square coordinate where the worker wants to move
      y - is the y square coordinate where the worker wants to move
      Returns:
      an ArrayList that is empty if the move is legal, otherwise it contains the errors that prevent the worker from moving.

    • checkBuild

      public java.util.ArrayList<Error> checkBuild​(Worker w, int x, int y, int l)
      This method overrides checkBuild (PowerDecorator) decorating decoratedPower with BuildBeforeMove rules.
      Specified by:
      checkBuild in interface Power
      Overrides:
      checkBuild in class PowerDecorator
      Parameters:
      w - is the worker that wants to build
      x - is the x square coordinate where the worker wants to build
      y - is the y square coordinate where the worker wants to build
      l - is the level the worker wants to build
      Returns:
      an ArrayList that is empty if the build is legal, otherwise it contains the errors that prevent the worker from building.

    • updateBuild

      public void updateBuild​(Worker w, int x, int y, int l)
      This method overrides updateBuild (PowerDecorator) and allows to modify nexStepIndication into xml request answer.
      Specified by:
      updateBuild in interface Power
      Overrides:
      updateBuild in class PowerDecorator
      Parameters:
      w - is the worker that builds
      x - is the x square coordinate where the worker builds
      y - is the y square coordinate where the worker builds
      l - is the level the worker builds
